data.eml:eml: Two New Jumping Spiders of the Genus Chalcoscirtus from China (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lei, He and Peng, Xian-Jin (2010): Two New Jumping Spiders of the Genus Chalcoscirtus from China (Araneae: Salticidae). Acta Arachnologica Sinica 19: 66-69, DOI: 10.3969/j.issn.1005-9628.2010.02.001
